website_summaries.verdict: The Mechanix Wear gloves to choose when you want good visibility while working.
pros: Bright, reflective fabric comes in several different fluorescent color options
Combined protection from EVA foam and thermoplastic rubber padding
Finger and thumb padding adds extra grip
cons: Some of the sizes tend to run a little loose along the fingers and wrist

customer_reviews.title: great glove
customer_reviews.text: great glove, i bought them for my dual sport. most of the reviews are true in that they do run big. i wear a 2 xl for most dollar store work gloves but i bought size large in these. they are a C hair too small but will likely be perfect once broken in. very bright. comfy. screen usage is a nice touch although it should have also been put on the middle fingers and not just thumb and index.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these gloves for about a week and shortly after there was a hole in the middle finger on both hands. I would wear these gloves while I was cutting wood. I wouldn't wear them for long periods of time either. Yes they are comfortable! No doubt about that but the quality of the overall tough spots not so much. Pretty upset I spent $35 for these gloves that couldn't handle my minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great except for durability
customer_reviews.text: I want to love these gloves because they were awesome while newish. I don’t use them super often or for really hard work and the fingers start to get holes I’ve had multiple pairs of these gloves and the story is always the same. Short lived great glove
customer_reviews.author: P B Celaya-Potter

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for long time usage
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are awesome. This is the second pair I bought (different color this time) and the last pair lasted me over a year of hard wear and tear at my job on a day to day basis. I move heavy furniture and other less than finger friendly items and they are perfect for the job. All of your pressure points are reinforced with foam insulated pads with leather over covers. The grip is amazing and you hardly lose any dexterity with your fingers. I'll be honest though trying to use a my cellphone with them on was miserable but other than that i had no problems. 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Taron Trent Clark

customer_reviews.title: shipped wrong glove
customer_reviews.text: What I received was not what I ordered. I need the fluorescent yellow on both sides for traffic control working an accident. The original glove was sized differently. A large fit my hand perfectly. These new ones were too big. I'm returning these gloves; am not happy!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great work gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great work gloves well padded. I'm a skinny guy with skinny hands. Even if I get my size (I did) gloves are still loose. This is the main reason I purchase this brand. They use velcro straps and are make to last more than one season. I have three different pairs of Mechanix brand gloves. I do not work or affiliated with the company. I just love the fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for motorcycle riders. See and be seen !
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I only use these to ride the motorcycle in, they match my helment and jacket. Very high viz and very little wind comes in these, which I really like while riding in the colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: David Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Very High Vis
customer_reviews.text: Fit pretty well. Very high vis so great for safety. Great for fall weather work temperatures. Solid construction you'd expect from mechanix. The only thing I didn't like was every dirt particle will stick to the rubberized knuckles on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Brett McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves. Perfect fit I have owned several of these products. So far they have not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Windwalker

customer_reviews.title: Great for riding, shooting, or working.
customer_reviews.text: This pair is my riding gloves for warm weather, and I am quite happy with them. Good: 1. Comfortable 2. Hi visibility 3. Wind cuts right through them Bad: 1. For the first week, these reeked of new plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Wallerstedt

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Feel and look is great. Fingers work seamlessly on touchscreen. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Arpesella

customer_reviews.title: Hi Viz!
customer_reviews.text: Durability leaves something to be desired. Not bad if you can find them for under $20.00, don't pay more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Knock Offs Sent
customer_reviews.text: I was sent some no name brand knock off and not Mechanix as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Nizi

customer_reviews.title: Odd smell
customer_reviews.text: I love these things they take a beating for me and I love the high visibility
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: They do what they need too
customer_reviews.text: They’re a little longer in the fingers then the fast fit gloves, so for using touch screen devices I have to keep pulling the gloves tight onto my hand So my fingers are at the tip of the glove, but they do what they need to.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby401

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long and runs small.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves lasted me about one and a half months in a commercial construction setting. I was hoping to get a little more out of them, but they began coming apart at the fingertips and tearing in high usage areas. They are also not ideal for getting small items such as screws out of pockets, I would regularly remove the gloves in situations where I would need to repeatedly get screws out of my pockets. They also run a bit small, I have other Mechanix gloves and the large size fit me perfectly until these gloves. I would recommend ordering a size up from your usual size.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Bright yellow
customer_reviews.text: Very bright yellow, flexibility and vibration resistant, must remove for dexterity intensive operations like removing sockets from the cheap hard plastic case and playing with iPhone ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Bright and durable
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size, comfortable glad I bought them. Very visible . Recommended to friends👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Buy these gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves to wear when riding my motorcycle, and I am very impressed! Great quality item, fast shipping, and I love the Hi Viz! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JP1970

customer_reviews.title: Ahh...
customer_reviews.text: Lateral side of index fingers blew out within a few days of 14hr use. The fingers got eaten up while screwing down subflooring. My fingers hole up better than these. However, they’re good for demo work.
customer_reviews.author: WMBrock

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend, he goes to work before sunrise in a motorcycle, and needs to wear something visible in low light conditions, and.. HE LOVE this gloves, they looks cool, and add a little bit more protection.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Good for operating a string trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I operate a string trimmer (weed eater) for my lawn care business. These gloves do a great job absorbing the vibration from the machines. I can definitely tell the difference between using these versus other gloves not designed for high impact, meaning little to no pain in my hands at the end of the day. They are comfortable, and the Velcro straps keep them tight on your hands. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: jbt333

customer_reviews.title: Best quality gloves I’ve bought and will keep buying.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a railroader for a large transportation company. My job requires me to mostly swing a sledge hammer. After getting constant blisters on my hands these bad boys help tremendously. I have not received one blister since using these and make using my tools much more comfortable. I will definetly be buying these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Well built and comfortable. A good glove that you can actually use with tools and touch is exceptional. Very bright color. I use mine with the fire department and they have been holding together very well!
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great working gloves. Not great for intricate work, but otherwise a solid choice
customer_reviews.author: sticksabuser

customer_reviews.title: Could have stronger fingers
customer_reviews.text: The gloves himself for nice and felt good but as a tow truck driver the finger tips wore out in about 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: ibleed117

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had gone with leather but this material will suffice. Good gloves I've had many similar pairs over the years. Color is good; maybe I'll notice my thumb before I hit it next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: Work warehouse merchandise and the gloves only held up two weeks before falling apart
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Had them for less than a week and I e already got holes in the finger tips. Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Trent B.

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable gloves, they last longer if you lightly super-glue some key seams. This is always the case with these multi-part gloves, these are tops for general laborer work.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 6 months now and they are holding up nice. A good product for what I paid for them. I have no holes and they are comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: They are nice, fit pretty well but not snug enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: They are nice, fit pretty well but not snug enough for my hands. Wish the palms and fingers had more padding. And a little too expensive but still are good gloves for everyday work.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: they work great. Can also be used for working if needed
customer_reviews.text: Use them primarily while street motorcycle riding, they work great. Can also be used for working if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Get seen!
customer_reviews.text: BRIGHT!!!! and protective... perfect for outdoor work especially if around chainsaws as people can't miss seeing this color.
customer_reviews.author: SteveO

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: Cannot grab small items like lug nuts and the like
customer_reviews.author: Richard ofori Antwi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: They are kind of cheap material and very thin on the finger tips. I work in construction had mine for about 3 weeks and they ripped on the finger tips.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves. Flexible. Able to pick up small items like screws and nails without issue. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: AZ21412

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little large
customer_reviews.text: It fit a little big but otherwise was a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Jason Alamo

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Good gloves so far, true to fit and comfortable. Seems like they're going to hold up well, but will add more once thoroughly tested.
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: must buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, long lasting, durable buying a second pair for my fire gear for extraction and over haul buy them you will live them!!
customer_reviews.author: joe grasso

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I work on the railroad so we'll see ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I work on the railroad so we'll see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle T.

customer_reviews.title: Will not last in the oil field.
customer_reviews.text: I work as a Able Bodied seaman on a large supply boat in the Gulf of Mexico and am always looking for good work gloves. These are not them. They have lasted 2 wks. Back to my Ringers!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: john f. rutledge jr.

product_meta.title: Mechanix Wear Size 10 Hi-Viz Yellow M-Pact Synthetic Leather And TrekDry Full Finger Anti-Vibration Gloves With Hook And Loop Cuff
product_meta.description: The Hi-Viz M-Pact XD work glove is built with XD synthetic leather to provide extreme durability for working hands. In low-light environments, ANSI-107 compliant reflective ink and fluorescent materials provide eye-catching luminance on the job. The Hi-Viz M-Pact XD features a secondary internal layer of XD synthetic leather to reinforce your index finger and thumb. Impact-absorbing Thermoplastic Rubber (TPR) extends from your knuckles to your fingertips, delivering critical pinch-point and impact protection. When you’re in full swing, D3O palm padding reacts on impact to absorb and dissipate energy through the palm of your hand.
feature_bullets: Patented Impact Guard protects the first knuckle with EVA foam padding.
Thermoplastic Rubber (TPR) knuckle guards and full-length fingertip protection reduce the risk of impact and pinching injuries.
Internal layer of XD synthetic leather reinforces your index finger and thumb for added durability.
D3O palm padding absorbs and dissipates high-impact energy through the palm.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars174 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
